fields.name: invoice_type
fields.label: Invoice Type
fields.description: Type of invoice (e.g., Commercial, Sales Tax, Proforma)
fields.extraction_hints: Look for document headers or titles

fields.name: invoice_number
fields.label: Invoice Number
fields.extraction_hints: Usually labeled as 'Invoice No', 'Bill No', or 'Doc No'

fields.name: buyer_name
fields.label: Buyer Name
fields.description: Name of the purchasing company or individual
fields.extraction_hints: May be labeled as 'Buyer', 'Customer', 'Bill To', or 'Sold To'

fields.name: supplier_name
fields.label: Supplier Name
fields.description: Name of the selling company or individual
fields.extraction_hints: Usually at the top of invoice, may be in header or labeled as 'Seller'

fields.name: invoice_date
fields.label: Invoice Date
fields.description: Date when the invoice was issued
fields.extraction_hints: Convert any date format to DD-MM-YYYY

fields.name: total_invoice_amount
fields.label: Total Invoice Amount
fields.extraction_hints: Final total amount, cannot be zero or empty

fields.name: sales_tax_amount
fields.label: Sales Tax Amount
fields.extraction_hints: May be labeled as GST, VAT, Sales Tax, or Tax Amount

fields.name: currency
fields.label: Currency
fields.extraction_hints: If not found, default to PKR

fields.name: po_numbers
fields.label: PO Numbers
fields.description: Purchase Order numbers referenced in the invoice
fields.extraction_hints: Must be numeric values with proper PO labels

fields.name: delivery_challan_number
fields.label: Delivery Challan Number
fields.description: Delivery challan or delivery order number
fields.extraction_hints: Look for DCN, Delivery Order, or Challan Number - not Gate Pass

fields.name: hs_code
fields.label: HS Code
fields.extraction_hints: Usually numeric code for product classification
